ygData.subject: Re: Salutations, gripes, and tricks
ygData.msgSnippet: ... That s what I meant.  Normally they will not stack, but lag somehow allowed you to bypass the server-side check (it s the same thing as the simultaneous
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, 13 Jul 1999, J.R. Hyde wrote:
> >From: John Kim <kim@...>
> >On Tue, 13 Jul 1999, J.R. Hyde wrote:
> >>
> >> accidently started the healing song at the same time and it stacked. We
> >> didnt get the hold message and we where healing almost 40pts per tick! We
> >
> >Probably a lag-incuded glitch. I noticed last night while
>
> Im inclined to say no on this... we did this multiple times all night.
> Health was rocketing up, it wasnt a subtle effect. However, we cant repeat

That's what I meant. Normally they will not stack, but lag
somehow allowed you to bypass the server-side check (it's the
same thing as the simultaneous transaction problem from
computer science).

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
